title.narrative: Feed the Future Agriculture Development Value Chain Enhancement (ADVANCE)

description.narrative: (Ghana): In support of Ghana's Global Food Security Strategy country plan, will increase the competitiveness of the maize and soybean value chains by increasing farmer productivity, profitability, and market access. This will increase smallholder farmer incomes and increase agriculture-led economic growth. Fiscal Year 2018 assistance will be used to increase access to and adoption of improved technologies and practices by smallholder farmers to improve the quality and increase yields. Also, USAID will create and strengthen market linkages between producers and major buyers to increase the price received by farmers; strengthen local organizations' and local governments' capacity to facilitate value chains; and train public and private sector actors to combat Fall Armyworm, an invasive pest that targets maize plants.. .

participating-org.narrative: Agriculture Cooperative Development International/Volunteers in Overseas Cooperative Assistance
